skills.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
skills.description: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, EDA, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Cleaning

skills.title: Tools & Platforms
skills.description: Google Colab, Jupyter Notebook, VS Code, GitHub

portfolio.title: Stock News Sentiment & Summarization
portfolio.description: Built an AI-driven system to analyze stock news sentiment and generate weekly summaries. This project used a Random Forest classifier trained on SentenceTransformer embeddings for sentiment analysis and Llama-2 for automated text summarization.

portfolio.title: Bank Customer Churn Prediction
portfolio.description: Developed a deep neural network classifier to predict bank customer churn. This project involved building, training, and evaluating multiple architectures in Keras (TensorFlow), optimizing the final model with Adam and Dropout to achieve 86% accuracy.

portfolio.title: Personal Loan Campaign
portfolio.description: Developed a predictive model to identify customers likely to accept a personal loan. This project used a Decision Tree Classifier optimized with post-pruning to improve generalization, achieving 98.5% accuracy and 91.3% recall.

portfolio.title: Food Aggregator App (EDA)
portfolio.description: Conducted an exploratory data analysis on 1,800+ orders to find the causes of low customer ratings. Used statistical (univariate and bivariate) analysis to correlate operational data with ratings, discovering that delivery and prep times over 25 minutes were the primary driver of low scores.

portfolio.title: Workout Placita
portfolio.description: A full-stack MERN social fitness app where users can create accounts, log notes on video workouts, and connect with friends to share routines and feedback.

portfolio.title: React Portfolio
portfolio.description: A single-page portfolio (this site) built from scratch using React and Vite, featuring a custom layout and reusable React components..
